languages.text: {n}Высокий мужчина в серой силовой броне, украшенной колонной с черепом, безусловно является высокопоставленным инквизитором. Он держится на периферии разговора, изредка снисходя до комментариев. Подле него стоит его свита — поджарый воин в черной броне и укутанный в алое {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g}, лицо которого скрыто медной маской.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Высокий мужчина в серой силовой броне, украшенной колонной с черепом, безусловно является высокопоставленным инквизитором. Он держится на периферии разговора, изредка снисходя до комментариев. Подле него стоит его свита — поджарый воин в черной броне и укутанный в алое техножрец, лицо которого скрыто железной маской.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The tall man in grey power armour adorned with a column with a skull is undoubtedly a high-ranking Inquisitor. He keeps to the periphery of the conversation, seldom deigning to comment. Next to him is his entourage — a rangy warrior in black armour and a {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} dressed in red, whose face is hidden behind a brass mask.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий мужчина в серой силовой броне, украшенной колонной с черепом, безусловно является высокопоставленным инквизитором. Он держится на периферии разговора, изредка снисходя до комментариев. Подле него стоит его свита — поджарый воин в черной броне и укутанный в алое {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g}, лицо которого скрыто медной маской.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The tall man in gray power armor adorned with a column with a skull is undoubtedly a high-ranking Inquisitor. He is keeping to the periphery of the conversation, seldom deigning to comment. Next to him is his entourage — a sinewy warrior in black armor and a Tech-Priest dressed in red, whose face is hidden behind an iron mask.{/n}

Next to him is his entourage — a sinewy warrior in black armor and a Tech-Priest dressed in red, whose face is hidden behind an iron mask.{/n}

Next to him is his entourage — a rangy warrior in black armour and a {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} dressed in red, whose face is hidden behind a brass mask.{/n}

languages.text: {n}背の高い男は、ドクロのついた柱状の装飾がほどこされた灰色のパワーアーマーに身を包んでいる。間違いなく、高位の異端審問官だ。男は表面的な受け答えをするにとどまり、意見を述べることは滅多にない。隣にはその側近だろうか、黒い鎧を着たしなやかな戦士、そして真ちゅうの仮面で顔を隠し、赤色をまとった{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}がいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man in grey power armour adorned with a column with a skull is undoubtedly a high-ranking Inquisitor. He keeps to the periphery of the conversation, seldom deigning to comment. Next to him is his entourage — a rangy warrior in black armour and a {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} dressed in red, whose face is hidden behind a brass mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}背の高い男は、ドクロのついた柱状の装飾がほどこされた灰色のパワーアーマーに身を包んでいる。間違いなく、高位の異端審問官だ。男は表面的な受け答えをするにとどまり、意見を述べることは滅多にない。隣にはその側近だろうか、黒い鎧を着たしなやかな戦士、そして真ちゅうの仮面で顔を隠し、赤色をまとった{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}がいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}那位身着灰色动力装甲、头戴骷髅圆柱装饰的高个子男子，无疑是名位高权重的审判官。他几乎没怎么参与过谈话，极少发表意见。在他身旁的是他的两位随从，一名身着黑色盔甲的高瘦战士，和一名身着红衣的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}，技术神甫的脸隐藏在黄铜面具后面。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man in grey power armour adorned with a column with a skull is undoubtedly a high-ranking Inquisitor. He keeps to the periphery of the conversation, seldom deigning to comment. Next to him is his entourage — a rangy warrior in black armour and a {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} dressed in red, whose face is hidden behind a brass mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那位身着灰色动力装甲、头戴骷髅圆柱装饰的高个子男子，无疑是名位高权重的审判官。他几乎没怎么参与过谈话，极少发表意见。在他身旁的是他的两位随从，一名身着黑色盔甲的高瘦战士，和一名身着红衣的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}，技术祭司的脸隐藏在黄铜面具后面。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hombre alto vestido con una servoarmadura gris adornada por una calavera es sin duda un Inquisidor de alto rango. Parece mantenerse en la periferia de las conversaciones, sin dignarse apenas a comentar nada. Le acompaña su séquito, un guerrero larguirucho con armadura negra y un {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} vestido de rojo cuyas facciones están ocultas por una máscara de latón.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man in grey power armour adorned with a column with a skull is undoubtedly a high-ranking Inquisitor. He keeps to the periphery of the conversation, seldom deigning to comment. Next to him is his entourage — a rangy warrior in black armour and a {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} dressed in red, whose face is hidden behind a brass mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre alto vestido con una servoarmadura gris adornada por una calavera es sin duda un Inquisidor de alto rango. Parece mantenerse en la periferia de las conversaciones, sin dignarse apenas a comentar nada. Le acompaña su séquito, un guerrero larguirucho con armadura negra y un {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} vestido de rojo cuyas facciones están ocultas por una máscara de latón.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dominant l'assemblée de toute sa taille, l'homme en armure grise décorée d'un crâne est visiblement un inquisiteur de haut rang. De ce que vous voyez, il se mêle très peu à la conversation et se contente de quelques commentaires laconiques ici et là. Son entourage est composé d'un guerrier élancé en armure noire et d'un {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} vêtu de rouge au visage dissimulé derrière un masque en cuivre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man in grey power armour adorned with a column with a skull is undoubtedly a high-ranking Inquisitor. He keeps to the periphery of the conversation, seldom deigning to comment. Next to him is his entourage — a rangy warrior in black armour and a {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} dressed in red, whose face is hidden behind a brass mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dominant l'assemblée de toute sa taille, l'homme en armure grise décorée d'un crâne est visiblement un inquisiteur de haut rang. De ce que vous voyez, il se mêle très peu à la conversation et se contente de quelques commentaires laconiques ici et là. Son entourage est composé d'un guerrier élancé en armure noire et d'un {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} vêtu de rouge au visage dissimulé derrière un masque en cuivre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der große Mann in grauer Servorüstung, die mit einem Schädel verziert ist, ist ohne Zweifel ein hochrangiger Inquisitor. Er hält sich im Gespräch eher zurück und steuert nur selten einen Kommentar bei. Neben ihm steht sein Gefolge – ein hochgewachsener Krieger in schwarzer Rüstung und ein {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} in Rot, dessen Gesicht hinter einer Messingmaske verborgen ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man in grey power armour adorned with a column with a skull is undoubtedly a high-ranking Inquisitor. He keeps to the periphery of the conversation, seldom deigning to comment. Next to him is his entourage — a rangy warrior in black armour and a {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} dressed in red, whose face is hidden behind a brass mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der große Mann in grauer Energierüstung, die mit einem Schädel verziert ist, ist ohne Zweifel ein hochrangiger Inquisitor. Er hält sich im Gespräch eher zurück und steuert nur selten einen Kommentar bei. Neben ihm steht sein Gefolge – ein hochgewachsener Krieger in schwarzer Rüstung und ein {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} in Rot, dessen Gesicht hinter einer Messingmaske verborgen ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Üzerinde kafatası bulunan bir sütun sembolüyle bezenmiş, gri renkli bir güç zırhı giyen uzun boylu adamın, yüksek rütbeli bir Engizisyoncu olduğu her hâlinden belli. Sohbete kenardan katılıp yorumda bulunmaya nadiren tenezzül ediyor. Kara zırh giymiş, sırığı andıran bir savaşçı ile yüzü pirinçten bir maskeyle saklı duran, kırmızılara bürünmüş bir {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip'ten{/g} oluşan maiyeti ise yanında duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man in grey power armour adorned with a column with a skull is undoubtedly a high-ranking Inquisitor. He keeps to the periphery of the conversation, seldom deigning to comment. Next to him is his entourage — a rangy warrior in black armour and a {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} dressed in red, whose face is hidden behind a brass mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Üzerinde kafatası bulunan bir sütun sembolüyle bezenmiş ve gri renkli bir güç zırhı giyen uzun boylu adamın yüksek rütbeli bir Engizisyoncu olduğu, her hâlinden belli. Sohbete kenardan katılıyor, yorumda bulunmaya nadiren tenezzül ediyor. Maiyeti ise yanında duruyor: Kara zırh giymiş, sırığı andıran bir savaşçı ile yüzü pirinçten bir maskeyle saklı duran, kırmızılara bürünmüş bir {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}.{/n}
